nodes.documentation:

@return uint8 The reason code: 0 means success.
nodes.name: releaseCollectedCapital

constructor.details: For the escrow to work properly, you need to set this variables.

params._hydroCapitalReceiver: The address of the capital receiver account
params._hydroSecurityTokenAddress: The address of the token being issued
params._issuingEndingTimestamp: Time+Date when token issuing must stop
params._totalHydroCapitalization: Total capitalization accepted, measured in Hydro

releaseCollectedCapital().return: uint8 The reason code: 0 means success.

releaseCollectedCapital().notice: Send the collected capital to the capital receiver

userdoc.notice: Stores HYDRO inside as an escrow for HST issuing. This contracts stores any funds sent by the token creator and the funds that users pay to participate in the issuing. It distributes any refunds, and the corresponding dividends and interests to their receivers.
